verses.verse: Then the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3059>Jehoahaz<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> and made him <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H1>father<s%>'s place in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H3099>Joahaz<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5493>deposed<s%> him at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H6064>fined<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> made <S%H471>Eliakim<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H5437>changed<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H3079>Jehoiakim.<s%> <S%H5224>Neco<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3099>Joahaz<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H3947>carried<s%> him to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God.<s%>

Against him came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H631>bound<s%> him in <S%H5178>fetters,<s%> to <S%H3212>carry<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

<S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> also <S%H935>carried<s%> of the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in his <S%H1964>temple<s%> at <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> and his <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which he <S%H6213>did,<s%> and that which was <S%H4672>found<s%> in <S%H3789>him,<s%> behold, they are written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> and <S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

<S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> was <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

At the <S%H8666>return<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> with the <S%H2532>goodly<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and made <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> over <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%>

and he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God;<s%> he <S%H3665>didn't<s%> humble himself <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> speaking from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He also <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar,<s%> who had made him <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H430>God:<s%> but he <S%H7185>stiffened<s%> his <S%H6203>neck,<s%> and <S%H553>hardened<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> against <S%H7725>turning<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Moreover all the <S%H8269>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> <S%H4604>very<s%> <S%H7235>greatly<s%> after all the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and they <S%H2930>polluted<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> which he had made <S%H6942>holy<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to them <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending,<s%> because he had <S%H2550>compassion<s%> on his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and on his dwelling <S%H4583>place:<s%>

but they <S%H3931>mocked<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H959>despised<s%> his <S%H1697>words,<s%> and <S%H8591>scoffed<s%> at his <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> until the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5927>arose<s%> against his <S%H5971>people,<s%> until there was no <S%H4832>remedy.<s%>

Therefore he <S%H5927>brought<s%> on them the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> who <S%H2026>killed<s%> their young <S%H970>men<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> and had no <S%H2550>compassion<s%> on young <S%H970>man<s%> or <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> old <S%H2205>man<s%> or <S%H3486>gray-headed:<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them all into his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

All the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6996>small,<s%> and the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and of his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> all these he <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

They <S%H8313>burnt<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and broke <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> all its <S%H759>palaces<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> all the <S%H4261>goodly<s%> vessels of <S%H3627>it.<s%>

He carried those who had <S%H7611>escaped<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H1540>away<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> and they were <S%H5650>servants<s%> to him and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> until the <S%H4427>reign<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia:<s%>

to <S%H4390>fulfill<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> until the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H7521>enjoyed<s%> its <S%H7676>Sabbaths.<s%> <S%H3117>As<s%> long as it lay <S%H8074>desolate<s%> it kept <S%H7673>Sabbath,<s%> to <S%H4390>fulfill<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

Now in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> might be <S%H3615>accomplished,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> so that he made a <S%H5674>proclamation<s%> throughout all his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and put it also in <S%H4385>writing,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H6485>me;<s%> and he has commanded me to <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> which is in <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> Whoever there is among you of all his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> be with <S%H5927>him,<s%> and let him go up.'"
